title: Science Learning and Cognitive Load Management Strategies Through Collaboration-Driven Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Science curriculum-linked program in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing cognitive load distribution through collaborative learner activities

learning_goals: Explain science concepts with over 80% accuracy by applying a collaboration-driven flipped learning model
Self-diagnose cognitive load during learning activities and apply 3 or more management strategies
Restructure learning content based on peer feedback to achieve over 70% participation rates

resources: Science Concept Video (5 minutes or less)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
